com.myronmarston.music
Class Note

java.lang.Object
  com.myronmarston.music.Note

public class Note
extends java.lang.Object

Represents a note, relative to a particular scale. This note will need to be converted to midi events using the MidiNote class before it can be used in a Midi track. The note doesn't know or care what scale is being used, but to get a concrete MidiNote, the scale must be used to convert it.

Constructor Detail

Note

public Note()
Default constructor.

Note

public Note(int scaleStep,
            int octave,
            int chromaticAdjustment,
            double duration,
            int volume)
Constructor.

Parameters:
scaleStep - number of scale steps above the tonic; 0 = tonic, 7 = octave, 9 = third an octave above, etc.
octave - which octave the note should be in. 0 begins the first octave in Midi that contains the tonic.
chromaticAdjustment - the number of half steps to adjust from the diatonic note; used if this note is an accidental
duration - how long the note should last, in quarter notes
volume - how loud the note should be (0-127)

Note

public Note(Note inputNote)
Copy Constructor.

Parameters:
inputNote - note to copy

throwUnsupportedOperationExceptionIfRest

protected void throwUnsupportedOperationExceptionIfRest(java.lang.String changingField,
                                                        int value)
Throws an exception if the changing field is not being changed to zero and the note is a rest. Called from the setters.
